eheyin hithakara kolestarol mattamak pawathwa ganimata nam santhruptha medaya saha trans fat yana dewargayama adangu aahara ganima sima kirima sharirayata uragatha haki thanthumaya aahara wadipura ganima soya protin sahitha aahara ganima shakamaya aahara wadipuraganima.santhruptha medaya saha trans fat yana dewargayama adangu aahara ganima sima kirima.hrudaroga diyawadiyawa ho ihala kolestarol mattamak sahitha pudgalayin dinakata gram 12th 17th athara santhruptha medaya adangu aahara laba ganima sirurata hithakara athara emagin sirurata awashya kalari pramanaya labagatha haka.

warak ma sinhalin palawu sowiyat prakashana winashakari parapurak bihiwimata hethu wu bawak liyu komentuwakata ruwan ekanga wuye na, mehidi ajith kiya athi pariddenma ma katha kara / sawan di athi 71 saha 88-89 wiplawakarin ee mangata piwisa thibune ema prakashanawalin kerunu propaganda asurin lath pelambaawimamathayi, owun siyallama wage guruwarunge daruwan ho ewani daruwan aashraya kala daksha daruwan, owun elipita wiplawakari adahas prakasha kalath siyathinma darunu aparadha kirimata thibu nohakiyawa nisado koheda athadanguwata pathwi jiwithaya beragena thibuna, namuth ma dana siti ema ugath (?)
sindu deka thunakma thiyenawa.
eeta behewin balapa thibune aya ugath buddhimath kala shilpiniyak bawa bohodenek nodanna karunak wima.
